Text: followed all included instructions and upon respring my iphone4 got caught in a loop.. tried reboot the device many times.. tried even deleting siri files via iFunBox .. till i finally had to do a major restore .. can you provide a more detailed step-by-step guide for a common noob.. thank u very much
iPod Touch 4G 32GB iOS 5.0.1 got stuck in a reboot loop twice. Waiting for updates on the .deb.
